name: Volibear
title: the Thunder's Roar
lore: The thunderous demigod known as the Thousand-Pierced Bear is the battle-spirit of the Freljord. Thousands of years of constant and bitter wars, fought in the coldest winters, have hardened Volibear into a truly indomitable force, hurling bolts of lightning from the highest peaks—and when snowy tempests rage down, it can only mean that he is on the attack once more. Any who dare to face him may find themselves joining his fierce army of Ursine warriors… assuming they do not fall victim to his savage claws.
blurb: The thunderous demigod known as the Thousand-Pierced Bear is the battle-spirit of the Freljord. Thousands of years of constant and bitter wars, fought in the coldest winters, have hardened Volibear into a truly indomitable force, hurling bolts of...
allytips: Lead the charge with Rolling Thunder and slow enemies with Majestic Roar.
Volibear benefits a great deal from additional Health and cooldown reduction.
You must attack three times in rapid succession before Frenzy can be activated - having the toughness to survive for a long time is one way to accomplish this goal.
enemytips: Volibear can gain great Movement Speed while chasing targets, but he gains much less of a bonus when running away.
Volibear regenerates a large amount of Health when he drops to critical Health.
Slowing or stunning Volibear when he tries to charge will greatly reduce his effectiveness.

riot_spell_q.name: Rolling Thunder
riot_spell_q.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

riot_spell_w.name: Frenzy
riot_spell_w.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e7 }}% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a minion or monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%.

riot_spell_e.name: Majestic Roar
riot_spell_e.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages, slows, and slightly knocks back enemies. Enemies who are airborne or dashing are dealt additional damage. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ damage }} magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back slightly and slowing them by {{ movespeedmod*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Enemies who are airborne or dashing take an additional {{ bonusdamageratio*100 }}% Max Health magic damage.

Additionally, minions and monsters are feared for 3 seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Thunder Claws
riot_spell_r.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number of nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

riot_spell_i.name: Chosen of the Storm
riot_spell_i.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Chosen of the Storm
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} When '''Volibear's''' health drops {{as|{{sti|health|below 30% of his '''maximum''' health}}}} he [[health regeneration|regenerates]] {{as|{{sti|health|30% of his '''maximum''' health}}}} over 6 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* ''Chosen of the Storm's'' cooldown starts as soon as it activates.
* If the cooldown ends while '''Volibear''' is under 30% health ''Chosen of the Storm'' will not trigger unless he takes damage.
* If '''Volibear''' is killed directly from anywhere higher than 30% health ''Chosen of the Storm'' will not activate and therefore will not go on cooldown.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Rolling Thunder
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next 4 seconds, increased when moving towards a nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy [[champion]] within {{tt|1800|Estimated}} units of him.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|15 to 25}}%|Increased Movement Speed|{{ap|30 to 60}}%}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: For the duration, '''Volibear's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|airborne|flings}} his target over and behind himself.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Rolling Thunder's'' bonus damage affects structures.
* Enemy can be flinged through very thin walls.
* ''Volibear'' will retain the bonus movement speed for ''Rolling Thunder's'' full duration even if he flings his target before it expires.
* When '''Volibear''' changes direction (from "towards champions" to any other direction), his bonus movement speed decays over 1 second.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Frenzy
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Volibear's''' basic attacks grant {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, '''Volibear''' gains the ability to cast ''Frenzy''.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed Per Stack|{{ap|9 to 25}}%|Total Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|9*3 to 25*3}}%}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' bites the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, increasing by {{as|{{pp|11|type=target's '''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 260}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' health)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 260*2}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description3: ''Frenzy's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is halved if it is used on a {{tip|minion}} or {{tip|monster}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Majestic Roar
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Volibear''' deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies, slightly {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for 3 seconds. [[Minion]]s and [[monster]]s are instead {{tip|fear|feared}} and slowed by 100% for the same duration.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Enemies who are dashing or are {{tip|airborne}} during ''Majestic Roar'' are dealt an additional {{as|8% of their '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|magic damage}}.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* {{tip|airborne|Airbone}} can also be enemies affected by ally abilities or {{ai|Rolling Thunder|Volibear}}.
* ''Majestic Roar'' will fear clones (e.g. {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}).

wikia_skill_r1.name: Thunder Claws
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.1}} seconds, '''Volibear''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to up to 8 nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Afterwards, for 12 seconds, '''Volibear's''' basic attacks deal the same damage as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} that bounces instantly to up to 7 nearby unaffected enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * On cast ''Volibear'' gets slightly larger in size.
